pages.text: 31|20|Tomara ki dekha na, niscaya allah asamanasamuha o yamine ya kichu ache sabakichu'i tomadera kalyane niyojita karechena ebam tomadera prati tamra prakasya o aprakasya anugraha sampurna karechena [1]? Ara manusera madhye ke'u ke'u kono jnana, kono pathanirdesa ba kono diptimana kitaba chara'i allah sambandhe bitanda kare.

31|21|Ara taderake yakhana bala haya, 'allah ya nayila karechena tomara ta anusarana kara.' Tara bale, 'baram amara amadera pitrpurusaderake yate peyechi tara'i anusarana karaba.' Sayatana yadi taderake jbalanta agunera dike dake, tabu'o ki? (Tara pitrpurusadera anusarana karabe)
31|22|Ara ye nijeke allahara kache samarpana kare ematabasthaya ye se muhasina [1] se to drrhabhabe dharalo eka majabuta hatala. Ara yabatiya kajera parinama allahara kache.

31|23|Ara ke'u kuphari karale tara kuphari yena apanake kasta na deya [1]. Amadera kache tadera pratyabartana. Atahpara amara taderake tara ya karata se samparke abahita karaba. Niscaya allah antarasamuhe ya rayeche se samparke samyaka abagata.
31|24|Amara taderake bhoga karate deba sbalpa [1]. Tarapara amara taderake kathina sasti bhoga karate badhya karaba.
31|25|Ara yadi apani taderake jijnesa karena, 'asamanasamuha o yamina ke srsti karechena?' Tara'i abasya'i balabe, 'allaha.' Baluna, ‘sakala prasansa allah‌ra'i’, kintu tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
31|26|Asamanasamuha o yamine ya kichu ache ta allahara'i; niscaya allah, tini to abhabamukta, cira prasansita [1].

31|27|Ara yaminera saba gacha yadi kalama haya ebam sagara, tara pare ara'o sata sagara kali hisebe yukta haya, tabu'o allahara bani [1] nihsesa habe na. Niscaya allah maha parakramasali, hikamata'oyala.
31|28|Tomadera sabara srsti o punarut'thana ekati pranira srsti o punarut'thanera'i anurupa. Niscaya allah‌ sarbasrota, samyaka drasta.
